title: The Concert for Bangladesh[DVD+2CD(FLAC)]
description:
Sinopsis
A recording of the 1971 concert at Madison Square Garden assembled by George Harrison to raise funds for UNICEF&#039;s relief efforts to aid war victims in Bangladesh. Ringo Starr, Eric Clapton, Bob Dylan, and Ravi Shankar are among the many performers who took part in the concert.

Star: George Harrison, Ringo Starr, Eric Clapton, Bob Dylan, Ravi Shankar, Leon Russell

Aspect Ratio: 1.33:1
